name: Pam Holland
what_you_do: Pam Holland is a virtual home organizer who helps people clear the chaos in their lives, keep what matters, and feel at home in their own space through mindful decluttering and organizing.
who_you_serve: Pam serves individuals, particularly women, who are looking to transform their living spaces and reclaim their energy by letting go of clutter.
signature_programs: Step By Step Guide To Mindful Decluttering, Declutter Your Life With Chakra Power virtual series, Declutter Your Life Podcast
current_projects: Creating a self-paced version of her popular virtual series and hosting the Declutter Your Life Podcast.
bio: Pam has over 45 years of experience in organizing and has guided hundreds of clients. She is also the author of 'All In the Family: Clutter and Your Primary Relationships.'
business_focus: Pam Holland is a virtual home organizer who helps people clear the chaos in their lives, keep what matters, and feel at home in their own space through mindful decluttering and organizing. (home organizing)
